Class TagAssigmentEdit

Namespace
PicScam.PicWindow
Assembly
PicScam.dll

Window for adding and removing tags from a picture. Works both on universally seen tags and tags set to be seen only by the current user.

public class TagAssigmentEdit : IMediator, INotifyPropertyChanged
